page.title: 12BIRSTALL C.C. FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content: The club was founded in the 1970's. There are regular meetings at {Longslade School and the Wanlip {Country Club.}Every year there is a prize giving evening where any trophy that has been won is presented. This year,{Tommy Williams, a Leicester City {player,}presented all the trophies. You have to be 9 years old to join and you must leave when you are 16. This year we entered a 5_a_side competition at the{Birstall May Fair and all of the teams apart from the Under 11's B Team and the Under 16's B Team won their finals. The Under 11's, the team I play for, were runners-up in a final and won a very splendid trophy at the{Derwent Dynamo {Tournament. A lot of support is needed at matches and meetings but we do not always get enough people to help.
